hero.name: Vinicius Gomes Rodrigues
hero.title: Software Engineer | Front-end | Back-end | Java | Springboot | SQL |
hero.description: I am a Software Engineering student with over 2 years of experience in building web and desktop applications. My expertise covers front-end frameworks such as React, back-end technologies like Node.js and Springboot, and database management including MySQL and PostgreSQL. In addition, I have knowledge in desktop development using JavaFX/JavaSwing.

degrees.title: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
degrees.institution: Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais - Feb 2024 - Dec 2027

degrees.title: RH124/RHA - Red Hat System Administration I
Data Modeling
degrees.details: Online course on database fundamentals, including basic structure, relationship types and the MER model, database integrity and normalization.

degrees.title: Scrum
degrees.details: Concept, history, real-world applications of the Scrum model in the job market, actors and roles in the IT team, ceremonies, and deadlines.7

projectsDashboard.heroSubtitle: A showcase of innovative solutions and passionate development across various domains.

projects.title: CranioFix
projects.description: E-commerce web software with sales and surgical product management, integrated with MercadoPago API, Google Maps and Gemini for delivery route creation. It also includes inventory management with AI-based replenishment suggestions and product reporting.

projects.title: Tem Que Ser
projects.description: Web platform for event and lecture management (similar to Sympla) with customer registration in events, member management by a master member, reporting, and partnership control in events.

projects.title: Alusoft
projects.description: E-commerce with a relational database integrated into the front-end interface, focused on companies in the construction sector, facilitating processes involving customer choice, purchase, and communication with the company.

projects.title: JavaParkings
projects.description: Desktop software for parking management, allowing companies to manage parks and clients through a graphical interface with real-time visualization of occupied and free spots, and report generation.

workExperience.title: Freelancer
workExperience.description: Development of web and/or desktop software

workExperience.title: Administrative Assistant
workExperience.description: Issuing invoices, preparing quotations and checking materials, customer service, financial spreadsheet control, requirements analysis and gathering, technical documentation, and construction planning.

degreeDetails.description: A detailed list of all subjects and grades in the Software Engineering degree at PUC Minas, showing my learning progress and experience across various technical domains.

contactSection.headerSubtitle: My goal is to turn ideas into great results. Whether you are looking for a partnership, want to discuss a concept, or just share ideas, I’m here to chat!
